sancharaka indiya kandayama ha sha්ri lanka kandayama athara mahanuwaradi pawathi thunwana ekdina tharagaye indiya kandayama jayaga්rahanayata itha aasannayen sitiyadi sha්ri lanka prekshakayin pitiyata pahara dennata wima nisa tharagaya nawatha damana ladi.tharagaye mulin panduwata pahara dun sha්ri lankawa siya pandu o්wara 50 awasanaye kadulu 09k dawi laba gath lakunu 217ta pilithuru lesa indiya pila pandu wara 43.6kadi kadulu 04k pamanak dawi lakunu 210k laba thibiyadi pe්rakshakayin his jala bothal aadiyen pitiyata mese pahara dunha.
